thread.title: Experiment: This Is What Metallica Would Sound Like If They Tuned Up 2.5 Steps [News]
thread.title_full: Experiment: This Is What Metallica Would Sound Like If They Tuned Up 2.5 Steps [News]

title: Experiment: This Is What Metallica Would Sound Like If They Tuned Up 2.5 Steps [News]
text:
Posted 15 hours ago 2 
Pete Cottrell from YouTube presented an interesting little experiment by rocking a string of Metallica classics tuned 2.5 steps up. 
The musician noted: "What if Metallica tuned up? Is it still heavy? Lets tune up to A standard, 5 semitones higher than normal and find out!" 
Some of the featured tracks include " Battery ," " Blackened ," " For Whom the Bell Tolls ," and more. You can check out the whole thing in the embedded video player below.
